name: Avoid using NOT IN  (RPG400)
description: This rule searches all the artifacts using NOT IN.
output:
This report lists RPG400 programs using NOT IN.
It provides the following information:
RPG400 Program full name
rationale: Use of 'NOT IN' keyword slows down the query
remediation: Queries should not use 'NOT IN' keywords in WHERE clause
remediationSample:
Use outer join and check for null:
SELECT c.CustomerID 
FROM Sales.Customer AS c
LEFT OUTER JOIN Sales.SalesOrderHeaderEnlarged AS h
ON c.CustomerID = h.CustomerID
WHERE h.CustomerID IS NULL;
sample:
SELECT CustomerID 
FROM Sales.Customer 
WHERE CustomerID NOT IN 
(
  SELECT CustomerID 
  FROM Sales.SalesOrderHeaderEnlarged
);

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
